pr_title: git ignore output directories & -d for ksql

timeline.message:
git ignore output directories & -d for ksql

update the template and all ksql tutorials to:
 1. use `-d` switch on `docker-compose up` so that test output is more easily grok'd
 2. switch site rendering to using the _expected output_, not intermediate _actual output_ files that are generated by the test run.
 2. add `.gitignore` to ignore output directories and delete them.

timeline.bodyText:
I think this file is extraneous. We can remove it, right?
templates/ksql/filtering/code/.gitignore was also created.
timeline.author: colinhicks

replies.bodyText:
I was under the assumption that this 'filtered' directory is the template used to create new tutorials, while _includes/tutorials/filtering, (which is what I assume you're referring to, though not the different root), is a tutorial instance.
I'm going to merge this PR - if I'm wrong and this file is superfluous, then please feel free to remove it!
replies.author: big-andy-coates
